lines.text: Now, one good turn deserves another. Could you point out to me the shortest route to the La Brea Tar Pits in Los Ahn-galays?
[suddenly realizing, MacRory runs off and quickly returns with a blunderbuss, pointing it at Bugs' back]
There are no La Brea Tar Pits in Scotland!

[picking up a spent bullet from his gun and loading it back in]
It's been in the family for years.

[disguised as aged Scotsman]
So, MacR-r-rory, poaching on my pr-r-roperty! I'm displeased, MacR-r-rory. You shouldnae shoot my r-r-r-rabbits.
Yon bonnie rabbit dinna belong to you.
[Bugs sets up a card table and deals cards]
No, no, we dinna play that game.

[pulling out two bags of golf clubs]
Golf!
Have it your way, Mac, but don't you get a little tired running them eighteen bases?

[MacRory is about to drive his golf ball]
Fore!
